entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except northeast 60 gusting to 80 through mainland inlets and valleys. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023
